name: valeria ville
text:
This is a great place to eat with different styles of pizza, salads, and beverages.
Our waiter, Tony, was the best; very attentive and made sure we were taken care ‚Ä¶More

name: Eric Christenson
text: If you like pizza (and who doesn't?), This is a must-visit for Louisville. We came for lunch and had a small cheese pizza; large pizza with vegan cheese, jerk tofu, onions, and a mix of mushrooms; and a sausage and pepperoni calzone. This ‚Ä¶More

name: Tiffany Thomas
text: The food was great and our server, Kelsey, did an amazing job with our 20 top! We will definitely be returning to this location.

name: Muan
text: The portion was more than enough! Got some boxes, couldn't finish it. Had the Calzone with steak and bacon. For the appetizer, I highly recommend the stuffed mushroom! One of the best in town. Finding a place to park was a pain though.

name: Dan Blake
text: Meatballs and mozzarella to start ... Luke warm and apparently microwaved meat. Steak sandwich was perhaps the saddest little thing to ever arrive on a plate

name: Romann Taylor
text: It was my first time there. The place is located out of Shelbyville Road, very desirable area to be in. The place has funky-cool deco with a bar and television everywhere. The food was my reason for going, very surprised at the prices, they ‚Ä¶More

name: Coley Wentworth
text: Great experience all around!  Best spinach and artichoke dip I've had in a while!  Pizza was huge and delicious!  The atmosphere was very family friendly and laid back!

name: Thomas Cook
text: Good pizza, good beer, good atmosphere.

name: Elisio Sapata
text: It‚Äôs a chain franchise that doesn‚Äôt seem very organized.  I have been to Mellow Mushrooms at quite a few other locations and never seem to have the wait or issues that this location has.  Get ready to wait; huge wait.  Order a beer ‚Ä¶More

name: Angela Marsh-Peek
text: Yummy! Love Mellow Mushrooms pizza and pretzel bites.  Great service at this location, Daniel R., was great.  Love that there is a step stool for kids to wash their hands.

name: Gail Passanisi
text: Every thing that could go wrong happened with trying to get a gluten free vegan pizza.  My omnivore friends said their pizza was only warm and wasn't anything special.  When I finally got my pizza, it had cheese on it... and the server told ‚Ä¶More

name: Lori Kelly
text: Really great pizza options for every kind of diet. Want meat? They got it. Want vegetarian? Yep. Vegan? Gluten free? They can do that, too. It's all delicious.

name: Patrick Logan
text: Mellow is not a fast food restaurant, and that's a good thing. The food is made to order and yummy. The servers are friendly and attentive. A good, ever changing, selection of beer. And all of that is designed for you to come in, relax, and spend some time.

name: Megan Jones
text: This place is really great. I have extremely strict diet restrictions and they were willing to work with me and I walked out with my belly full. The menu has so many choices. They have pizza, sandwiches, burgers, and more. Also the decor in ‚Ä¶More

name: julie durham
text: Great pizza! Loads of beer to choose from and nice atmosphere. Service is great. Great place for trivia on Wednesday nights too. Didn't care for their hot wings but everything else was delicious.

name: Clarena Wright
text: It was our first visit and when we walk in the employees keep ignoring us finally the host show up and got a bad attitude and told us that a customer vomit all over in the dining area, the table where they sit us was dirty and we couldn't eat with the smell. We will not recommend their place to anyone.

name: Brandi Lock
text: Our first time and the pizza surpassed all expectation. The crust was super fresh, the toppings we're plentiful and the beer was great. Will definitely eat there again üòã

name: jack wallen
text: The service as this particular Mellow Mushroom is always terribly slow. This time around we waited 60 minutes for an appetizer and pizza ... only to find out they messed up the appetizer and then be given a pizza with the wrong toppings. ‚Ä¶More

name: Bianca P
text: Mellow Mushroom has awesome pizza but usually pretty bad service. All their ingredients taste fresh and their pizza crust is some of the best in the city! However, this place is often busy and usually filled with kids.

name: Lee McWhorter
text: Went at 4:45 PM on a Sunday. The place wasn't packed. Ordered wings for an appetizer, 3 pizzas and a steak sandwich. The wings were warm not hot, which was not a big deal. When the pizzas and the steak sandwich came they were all cold, like ‚Ä¶More

name: Aaron Plas
text: Amazing pizza. My family and I traveled back from Michigan for this pizza. The crust is to die for. Great variety of pizza and beer.

name: Courtney McCampbell
text: This is a great pizza place with even better service! Our waiter was funny, personable and did an outstanding job. The food was delicious. I have tried almost everything on the menu or friends have tried it and we have yet to find anything ‚Ä¶More

name: Dj Williams
text: Looked online to ensure their hours. Bought Groupon. Drove 15 minutes to find that they're closed.

name: Annme 66
text: Love this place. Great food. Lots of great options for vegetarians, vegans and meat eaters as well. My husband and I go here often with our daughter and her boyfriend. We all leave stuffed. Nice servers too!

name: Michael Boyle
text: After waiting over an hour for our pizzas, and watching others who came in well after us get there's first, the toppings were fresh. The sauce was good. But somehow the pizza was missing something. It probably didn't help that who ever made ‚Ä¶More

name: Gerald Jones
text: The atmosphere and the waitress were great.  All for the food looked great.  My California Club sandwich was dry, but everyone else in my party rated the pizza one of the top two in Louisville.  I will try the pizza next time.

name: Ben Lambrechts
text: Awful service, took 15 minutes before a drink order was even taken. Appetizer was pretzels that came out black and hard as a rock. Pizza was decent but the night was already ruined from the other terrible service.

name: Harry Hood
text: Love it.  Everything was great.  Need to keep the beer list up to date.  Two of the three we picked were out.

name: Heather Roberts
text: This is one of our favorite places in the neighborhood. The staff is very nice and goes out of their way to accommodate our requests. We eat there at least once/week. They regularly give little surveys out on the receipts so it makes coming ‚Ä¶More

name: Eric Winke
text: Great family-friendly atmosphere and staff. We always have a great food experience at MM. The food offerings are consistently plentiful and delicious - especially the pizza. They also have a wide variety of great beers on tap. Prices are reasonable for the great experience and food provided.

name: Mike McGuire
text: Excellent food and service. Went there for trivia. Great audio and everything went off without a hitch

name: Brittany Albers
text: Great pizza and cool atmosphere. As all pizzas are made to order, expect to wait for your food (duh!). Good beer selection.

name: T M
text: Perfect!  The service is wonderful, the pizza grand, and the sangria is delicious. Parking sucks, but it's in St. Matthews so what can you expect?  It does not take away from the wonderfulness of Mellow Mushroom though.  It's worth the parking fuss!

name: Frank Thompson
text: Okay. I LOVE Mellow Mushroom pizza. However, my visit today was really lacking. And....If I want them to remain a place where people want "to drive across town" to have a slice, then they need a bit of criticism. Their management team needs ‚Ä¶More

name: Andrew M
text: Best tasting pizza I've ever had. Vegan options are great. Single bad experience with getting my order wrong twice, I didn't bother complaining the second time. Pizza was cold by the time it was 'corrected' the first time. ‚Ä¶More

name: Mi Lei
text: We started with an order of warm freshly baked pretzels. I grew up in Philly & these were as good, if not better.  Then we each had a small pizza. Plenty of toppings on each. Delicious dough & marinara sauce. None of Us could finish all the food.  Server was attentive & brought all the food piping hot & filled water glasses as needed.

name: Jennifer
text: Have been to at least 6 different Mellow Mushrooms from Indiana all the way to Tennessee and this is the best pizza I've had, ever! Mind you, I live in a Detroit. So if a city has a MM, I'm there in a heartbeat.ü§™

name: Jenn Barr
text: The pizza was amazing, even though it was never cut.  The service was horrible.  I recommend carry out for sure.

name: Linda Fitts
text: They always have well made pizza. Good variety of menu choice. Extensive beer list. Lots of TV's with sports. Good place to go with a group. Service was not real efficient but ok for a pizza place!

name: Michael Hurt
text:
Went to Mellow Mushroom after a soccer game.
Environment and food were good.  Staff was excellent.  Emily and Tina were a big help!

name: Delysha D'Mellow Henry
text: The waitress today was not attentive to us. We had to ask another person (who turned out to be the manager on duty) when our food would be delivered. She found out our waitress never put our order in! The GM came over and apologized and ‚Ä¶More

name: Patricia Fisher
text: I really enjoyed my visit to Mello Mushroom. We ordered a small half pepperoni and bacon pizza. The pizza looked and tasted great!  The restaurant has a very comfortable and unique look. It is in a great area. Please try it!!!

name: Kimberle Stratton-Linehan
text: My Grandson baptismal party was held there. I was impressed how organized they were that early in the morning for the large group we had. Very attentive service and very nice atmosphere. And they gave me my money's worth of bottomless ‚Ä¶More

name: Chad Justice
text: They were not busy at all, but parking was still a huge pain and it took almost an hour to get a small pizza and two calzones to the table. The pizza was barely warm at the center. That plus three soft drinks was almost $50. Never again.

name: John Walling
text: Not our first less than favorable experience. Was seated and asked to move. Wait staff took drink order and appetizers. Wait staff was great. 15 mins in, waiter said apps were next out. Tables next to us had their apps already. We were ‚Ä¶More

name: Mike Malone
text: The food was good but the manager was very rude. The waiters were friendly. First i walked in and had to wait ten minutes to be seated the manager was showing the bar tender how to make something knowing we were there he should of said ‚Ä¶More

name: Nicole
text: I love the enlightened spinach salad!   Everything I've had here has been amazing (Pizza/pretzel bites/etc) but the enlightened spinach salad is my favorite.  Great atmosphere, so friendly and laid back.

name: Scott Rohde
text: Awesome place. A new use for garage doors. This is pizza. So glad they're here, heard rave reviews about the one in Destin FL. The prices are really worth the quality and uniqueness of the style of pizza they have. Excellent beer and port ‚Ä¶More

name: William Tribbey
text: I love the Mellow Mushroom and they know how to do customer service. Had to wait a bit to get the pizza so they gave me a drink. No beer cheese ready for the pretzel bites so they gave me some mellow bucks. Their pizza is so good it  has made me hesitate to eat other pizza.

name: Marie Guenin
text: Food was awesome. Hubby and I had their mushroom soup, so freaking good. Then we split a 6 inch mushroom ham and bacon sandwich with cheese. So tasty

name: Stephie Abraham
text: After going to mellow mushroom for years at another location I made the mistake of thinking that this location was going to be great too. I made an online order for a large, thin crust pizza with less cheese and with added chicken. I got a ‚Ä¶More

name: Savannah
text: I visited Mellow Mushroom for the first time yesterday and was very pleased with my experience. Our waitress was very friendly, though it took about 20 minutes of sitting and waiting before we received our check. However, the food was delicious! The calzone was huge and definitely worth the price. I highly recommend this place!

name: Christopher Harrod
text: Took 1 hr and 30 minutes to get our pizza on a weeknight with hardly anyone else eating that night. When our pizza came, it was lower quality than any fast food pizza we could have gotten. Food was bad and service was bad.

name: E D
text: Went on a Thursday night and arrived and ordered before it got crowded.   Our order was simple:  cheese pizza and salad.   Waited over an hour and our confused waiter kept telling us it was coming.  In that time he seemed to have no idea ‚Ä¶More

name: Sean Harrington
text: The entire staff was very accommodating to our large group. Order was perfect and food tasted great. Didn't have to wait too long, even though we had a large order. The waitress wrote nice personal notes on our receipts, which was super nice.

name: David Lane - 4PXTD
text: Pizza was very good.  Cool, funky place.  Wait staff was "too laid back" but food made up for it.

name: Melissa Shaber
text: The wait time was an hour and 1/2 for food even though the restaurant was only about 1/4 full. Staff said there was only 1 employee in the kitchen. We love Mellow Mushroom- please provide appropriate staffing.

name: BanditHQ32
text: Nice upbeat atmosphere.  Great appetizer (spinach artichoke dip) excellent salads and hoagies.  Tremendous draft beer selection

name: Shaun Mathias
text: We love eating any Mellow. We love the patio at this one with the Alice and wonderland theme.

name: Nicole Golston
text: The pizza here is AMAZING! I tried the BBQ chicken. Take advantage of the specials they run. Bottomless Mimosas!

name: James Murdock
text: If you can stomach a long wait for the pie, you will be rewarded with great crust and tasty toppings. Great waitstaff to boot!

name: John broughton
text: Best pizza for the price. Great atmosphere and awesome staff.

name: Derek Smith
text: Arrived around 835pm. Stood by door waiting for about 10 minutes before guy that works there gets up from bar and tells us they stop taking orders at 830pm even though they close at 10pm rudely. Walked down street to diorio's got great customer service and food. Will never be back.

name: Karen Thorne
text: My favorite pizza in Louisville! My son who has dairy allergies can get a pizza with dairy-free cheese. They also have a good selection of draft beer.

name: Emily Miller
text: Food was good but it took two hours for dinner for six adults and three kids. The server forgot to bring our salads, and the kitchen was out of several things we ordered (how can you be out of carrots and Mac and cheese?). Our server had another very large group - he shouldn't have been assigned to any other groups.

name: Lori House
text: Nice place, employees, food and atmosphere

name: HerrDescartes
text: Fun place to eat. I had gluten free pizza. We each enjoyed our meal. Sat by a large, open window - almost like sidewalk seating but under a roof. I would eat there again.

name: Dale Tompkins
text: This unfortunately was one of the worst experiences I have ever had in a restaurant. The whole dining experience from beginning to end was mishandled. I have never written a negative review before because having been in the industry and ‚Ä¶More

name: Matthew Gantz
text: Stop #337 for @pizzas365: Mellow Mushroom has a decent pizza, with varieties to choose from that include vegan and fairly fresh options. The chicken on my pizza was surprisingly tender. 3.6 Stars.

name: Marianne Jones
text: They told me it would be a 45 min to 1 hour wait. We waited 1 hour and 30 minutes. When we finally got our pizzas, they forgot one. The staff and manager weren't friendly or apologetic.

name: Christopher Felts
text: Flavors out of this worried and a laid back environment. Their service was a little to laid back for me though. Really cool place.

name: Eric Conover
text: Waiter was real friendly and offered suggestions on what the 'best'  dishes were.  Settled on the cheese bread for an appetizer....holy cats! So delicious! Highly recommended.  The pizza was equally delicious and the beer selection is awesome!  Only gripe was food took a while to come out.

name: J Yu
text: Server was very chill. Laid back and casual ambiance.  I don't usually eat crust and I ate the pizza crust. There are lots of specialty pizzas and you can also build your own or order by the slice. By the slice options are limited. They ‚Ä¶More

name: Steve Klimesh
text: Ordered online for a predetermined time. When I got there at said time they had not started on the order. It's a good thing they have good pizza!

name: olivia h
text: It was very good, but was busy at some times and took a while.

name: Jennifer Ulaszek
text: This location is just not consistent. The last two times we went it was perfect and delicious but tonight the pizza was slightly flavorless and definitely sparse toppings. A beer should never cost more than $6 a glass!  Our poor watress was ‚Ä¶More

name: Renee Liekweg
text: Best pizza around. We always get holy shitake with sausage added, it's tastier than any pizza I've had. St Matthews mm has s great atmosphere too, big garage windows that open when it's nice, very friendly staff. A little pricey compared to other pizzas, but worth it.

name: James MILLER
text: Very good pizza!  Good cider selection

name: Steven Allen
text: This is a great place, and my waitress Caroline was very nice and quick in serving me.

name: Robert Tucker
text: Anthony gamble gave great service.  I ordered 2 pepperoni pizzas and 4 brownies and a cho late chip and a new albany brew. Had a great expatience guys!

name: Rick Koch
text: Love the pizza here not just the traditional everyday pizza. They have gourmet pizza as well.

name: Melanie Blackburn
text: Absolutely love coming here. Joe, the bartender, always makes us feel so welcome and makes the best drinks in town. I don't go anywhere else. The food is amazing! Every time I come here to enjoy the atmosphere and to see my favorite bartender, Joe.

name: Hector Mendoza
text: Excellent pizza very unique place. I loved the atmosphere in this place the service was pretty good considering it was busy in there. Thank you Mellow Mushroom Staff for taking care of us, especially me being a pain in the ass about more water .. lol

name: Greta Koning
text: When I visited Louisville this past weekend, I had both a beer there and watched the NCAA basketball tournament (featuring U of L of course) and we had takeout pizza from here. I think the pizza has been consistently good and they have some ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeff Winkler
text: I've been to this location several times and figured I needed to write a quick review.  Personally I'm a big fan of this place.  The wait staff are typically very nice and cheerful and provide good service. ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris & Catherine
text: Baught a groupon for this location just passing through town and looking for something different. My wife and I ordered a cheese pizza and some waters, close to two hours later we were informed that the kitchen lost our ticket amd the pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Sara Harrison
text: The service at this restaurant is horrible. The waiter always forgets to put our orders in and the last three times we have been there we had to wait 2 hours for our food and it was given to us on the house. Additionally the pizza is greasy and has too much cheese. The manager was nice but other than that it is horrible.

name: Patrick Bruneel
text: Great pizza, good beer prices. I personally wasn't as big on the cheese flavor but rest of my friends loved it so just personal preference. Will definitely go back

name: Joe Lights
text: Simply amazing food and service here. We had a great time and they have wonderful vegan options as well.

name: Donna Bolls
text: I've been there twice (Shelbyville Rd location) and have had a great experience both times. Stsff was friendly, food was amazing, atmosphere was great. Highly recommend.

name: Jenelle Sanders
text: Great food, as always. Fun staff but slow. 20+ minutes for our check and we finally had to chase her down.

name: Elaine Ronau
text: Great service! Always love the pretzels appetizers! Will definitely be back!

name: Barbara K
text: Tasty and different crispy crust on the pizzas. Large selection of alternative pizza toppings. One of the few pizza places in Louisville that offer vegan cheese as a pizza topping.

name: John Cummings
text: Funky hipster pizza place. . . Spinelli's is slipping away. Maybe this will eventually rise into it's place?

name: Kenneth Wientjes
text:
Its good.
Get what you pay for.
Great service as well.

name: Debra Ernspiker
text: Mellow Mushroom in St. Matthews is some of THE BEST pizza in Louisville!  The staff is very friendly and the food is always delicious.  It takes awhile to make the pizza because the crust is made fresh in house.  They have wonderful ‚Ä¶More

name: Jema Baker
text: Sit at the bar if Joe is working! He is always extremely knowledgeable of the beers on tap and can make recommendations based on other beers you like. As far as gluten free crusts go, this is one of the better tasting ones available. The outstanding service and good food keeps us coming back!

name: Steve Kearney
text: Used to have a mellow mushroom down the street when I lived in Memphis but now I'm out west and don't have these around. Was so happy to see Louisville had a mellow mushroom, very much lived up to my expectation!

name: Tina lefta
text: Great food, generous portions and exceptional service! Kasey, one of the severs offered to take our family picture and our server Michael was very friendly and attentive. We had a great dining experience and will return again!

name: Remington Crawford
text:
Great food, decent service.

Edit: lowering review.  They switched to a different gluten free crust which is ‚Ä¶More

name: David Crow
text: Great beer list. Good, chewy pizza crust with inventive toppings. Surprisingly good salads. Always pleasant service.

name: Keith Labrecque
text: I had a very tasty white pizza. My companion had a delicious, very large calzone. The service and atmosphere were above expected. Recommended.

name: Erica Carlson
text: It‚Äôs a decent place, I just personally hate their pizza. The last time we tried it, there was about an hour wait for our food and we only had 4 people on a Thursday evening at 6pm.

name: Heuristic ALgorithm
text: It's pretty decent, nothing spectacular, had better. They seem to think their pizzas are made of gold, judging by their prices. If you really want to try it, go ahead. However, if you're on the fence about spending $27 for a medium pizza, ‚Ä¶More

name: Julie McIntyre
text: The service was good and the pizza was delicious! A fun, quirky place to go with family or friends.

name: Gregg Brekke
text: My first experience here was not so good - crust was not cooked through so tasted like raw dough. Gave it a second chance and the pizza was really great. Though the restaurant was not busy, our service was pretty slow - could have been an off night...

name: Dada's Girls
text: The mushroom soup is EVERYTHING!! The waitress messed ny order up...but went above and beyond to fix it and make it right! I love GREAT service and GREAT food.

name: Myra Clayton
text:
Pizza was just okay and triple the cost that would be appropriate for the quality.
Who drizzles aioli on a pizza anyway?

name: Jason Bagan
text: Epic pizza and atmosphere. Perfectly placed in an great part of town. Get there early and enjoy the amazing things they can create.

name: Stacey Capito
text: I had almost given up on eating at Mellow Mushroom after a couple of bad carry out experiences.   That changed after I recently joined up with a few friends to peruse the new beer menu at the bar.  Joe,  the bar manager,  has always been ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris Roberts
text:
Edit again: happy hour is back!!!

Edit: they used to have the best happy hour in town...under new ownership and ‚Ä¶More

name: Billy O'Bryan
text: My favorite pizza! Great atmosphere and great service. Awesome beer selection

name: Tracey Henderson
text: We had a wonderful time and the staff was excellent

name: Christian Wilkerson
text: waited over an hour to get food, the sever was rude. asked for ranch three times the girl said yeah i‚Äôll get it never once brought it. had to get boxes and water my self. never going back absolutely terrible. you need new workers or something.

name: Julie Lockhart
text: Great pizza great service ... fabulous sponsor to a CycloCross bicycle team

name: Rachel Collier
text: It was so yummy.  The bartender, Joe, was absolutely delightful.  12.5 out of 5 stars.  I'd give it 13, but that would be less arbitrary.

name: Andrew Voll
text: We stopped in the othe night and were greeted about 15 minutes after arriving.  When we finally get seated the waiter would not come ariund very often even though they were not busy.  The pizza comes after 2 HOURS.  He said they were behind ‚Ä¶More

name: Charlie Christensen Phillips
text: Staff is always great. We always sit at the bar. Joe the bartender is one of the most awesome bartenders in Louisville. He's super friendly and always knows his beers. He remember faces and what you drank and always has new suggestions ‚Ä¶More

name: Steven W
text: Lots of people seem to love this place; I don't see what all the fuss is about.  They have some unique menu items, but I have never been able to find a favorite that makes me want to return over and over again.  Clean store and friendly staff, though!

name: Mont M
text: Ordered pretzel bites, straight out of the oven with beer cheese and marinara sauce. Hailey is on the floor. She is professional and friendly. Skeleton crew, had to wait few to get seated. ‚Ä¶More

name: Gloria Flowers
text: Ordered pizza and salad.. asked that the sausage be left off the pizza we ordered...sausage was left on..  ugh! Crust was hard snd tough on the bottom. I gave 4 stars ...hoping this particular night was just a bad night.

name: James Armstrong
text: The service is terrible...we waited 1.5 hours for our pizza.  No wonder the  location in jtown went out of business.  How long does it take to make pizza?  I could go to the store, buy the ingredients and cook the pizza in less time.  Go somewhere else.  It's not worth the wait.

name: Stephen Bruegge
text: Best calzone I've ever had. I didn't want it to end.

name: Robin Bensinger
text: Good but a little too cheesy

name: Jason Judd
text: Great food but slow food

name: Bill Reynolds
text: Ms. Kim was a fantastic server! Great food and specials

name: MaryKay Hostein
text: Best pizza I've had in a long time. Unique variety of pizzas. Very nice wait staff.

name: Ashley Grimes
text: Awesome pizza, friendly staff, variety of beer and cocktails with 50 rotating drafts. Love the open kitchen.

name: Larry Stratton
text: The service is very good and the selection of vegetarian items is great.  Mellow Mushroom is always a good place to go for good pizza and a good time.

name: Kaylee Campbell
text: Great Pizza, great service, cool atmosphere. Also, a really great beer selection.

name: Maria Malone
text: The food and our waitress Tina, they were both awesome! However, when we entered the restaurant, we waited 5 mins before anyone even acknowledged us! No hostess, and we were looking right at the bar. Looked right at the bar tender and the ‚Ä¶More

name: Laurie Denomme
text: Consistently good pizza every visit.

name: John Newman
text: Good food, beer selection and service.  Pretty loud.

name: Michelle West
text: Good food, decent service

name: Silas Lee
text: Service was great and the food was wonderful as usual.

name: Julie Jeanes
text: I went to this facility for burger week and the featured item was less than average. The only saving grace was the bread and beer cheese; however, they want to charge you for each little cup of cheese you get which is already a very small ‚Ä¶More

name: Cheri Louise
text: Stopped in here today with my bf. The staff was friendly and the pizza we ordered was amazing!!! Loved the decor too!

name: Kris Smith
text: Soul S!ster üç∑üç∑üç∑üç∑üç∑~ A~1 Happy Hour

name: William Miles
text: Great food, friendly service, laid - back atmosphere ‚ò∫‚úå

name: The Scintillating Scientist
text: Mmmm.....something for everyone...and always delicious

name: Chiquita Noyes
text: Great service. Amazing pizza. Just a little busy on a Friday night (as expected for a good resturant) felt a little claustrophobic getting to our table. Not alot of parking.

name: Kristen S
text: Love Mellow Mushroom! Always good pizza and service!

name: Branden Miller
text: Huge salads. Great pizza!

name: Phil A
text: Really great garlicky shiitake mushroom pizza, really great salad. A+

name: Jessica Lee
text: Cosmic karma was delicious and their crust is chewy and delicious!

name: Stephen Stricklin
text: Nice atmosphere. Affordable craft beer. Enormous servings.

name: Charles Kowalczyk
text: Great za and beerz

name: Patrick Sawyer
text: Awsome food and atmosphere

name: Rodney Lockridge
text: The pretzel bites were good and I've had pizza there before. Don't get a burger. They don't look like the ones online. They are terrible at burgers.

name: Pamela Britt-Smith
text: Pizza is great, service is lacking. Can do better with larger groups of people.

name: Amelia Ray
text: Great atmosphere,  amazing food

name: Cyn Matters
text: Decent pizza. Kind of loud. Could barely have a conversation.

name: Zakariyya Alquran
text: Pizza is decent (not the best ever) but overall good

name: Shannyn Giles
text: Mellow Mushroom is one of our favorite pizzas places and this location did not disappoint. We were there on a Wednesday evening and they were doing trivia which was fun and interesting.

name: Michael Burton
text: Good pizza good salads friendly service

name: Kristi Kulijof
text: Waited for over an hour for our pizza. Ot wasnt busy at all. Waiter only offered my husband a refill my cup was empty for quite awhile before we left. Waiter didnt check on us at all. One of the worst Mellow Mushrooms we've been to. We've ‚Ä¶More

name: desi brooks
text: A really fun place to eat. The food was excellent and staff were very friendly and accommodating.

name: Chris S
text: Nice bar area and location. They usually have some good and interesting beers on tap. Pizza is good but not my favorite.

name: Teri Wood
text: Great pizza....but they dont know how to manage delivery. We have now been waiting 2 hours on delivery. We called back at 1 hour and were assured the pizza would be there in a few minutes.  They called 30 minutes ago to say they didn't have ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeremy P
text: Love the food.  The poor attention by the waitress and lack of manager over-site  lost them two stars, otherwise I normally give them 5 stars.

name: Jerry Stains
text: Love there pizza and wings. Service was not good and we were there at a slow time.

name: Rachel Holley
text: Delicious, unique pizzas. And gluten free crusts are available too!

name: Jeff Myers
text: Tasty pizza, everyone happy, all 7 of us!

name: justin vasher
